list.item: yī (OC: qliɡ MC: ʔit) 於悉切 入 廣韻：【一古文 】

yī (OC: qliɡ MC: ʔit) 於悉切 入 廣韻：【數之始也物之極也同也少也初也又虜三字姓後魏書一那婁氏後改爲婁氏於悉切三 】
number>ONE
be the first of several>PRECEDE
so as to start what continues as the same>BEGIN
invariant>SAME
invariant over time>ENDURING
invariant over all instances>ALL
one… the other>OTHER
focus on the same>CONCENTRATE
this one>THIS
in its entirety>WHOLE
grammaticalised: and no others>ONLY
only on certain occasions>SOMETIMES
causative>UNITE
unite in one place>GATHER
grammaticalised: frequency>ONCE
subordinating:logically>IF
temporally>WHEN
immediately>AS SOON AS
post-Han: grammaticalised (compare French un)>INDEFINITE ARTICLE

有 yǒu (OC: ɢʷɯʔ MC: ɦiu) 云久切 上 廣韻：【有無又果也取也質也又也又姓孔子弟子有若又漢複姓有男氏禹後分封以國爲姓出史記云乆切九 】

in hands>HOLD

as part>CONTAIN
be contained in world>EXIST
as relevant>IMPORTANT

transivive feature>RELATION
alive>LIVE
inchoative>ARISE
of animates>BIRTH
of events>HAPPEN
a second time>AGAIN

in a number of cases>SOME
in addition to some>AND

at a number of times>SOMETIMES
abstract: feature>POSSIBLE
acceptably so>ACCEPTABLE
with difficulty only>DIFFICULT
alternatively>OR
there was a time when>ONCE
dynamic: so as to enact>ACT
act on something with an ulterior purpose>USE
as indispensable means>RELY ON
rely on to work for one>EMPLOY
grammaticalised: object>WHAT

zhī (OC: kljɯ MC: tɕɨ) 止而切 平 廣韻：【適也往也間也亦姓出姓苑上而切四 】
physical movement>GO TO
grammaticalised, adnominal>THIS
post-nominal1>GENITIVE PARTICLES
post-nominal2>APPOSITIVE PARTICLES
adding a subordinate clause>RELATIVE CLAUSE MARKER
nominalising the predicate of a sentence>NOMINALISER
nominalised conditional>IF
subordinator topicaliser of times>WHEN
concurrent>WHILE
adding a subordinate clause>RELATIVE CLAUSE MARKER
nominalising the predicate of a sentence>NOMINALISER
nominalised conditional>IF
subordinator topicaliser of times>WHEN
adding a subordinate clause>RELATIVE CLAUSE MARKER
nominalising the predicate of a sentence>NOMINALISER
nominalised conditional>IF
subordinator topicaliser of times>WHEN
concurrent>WHILE
exocentric>PRONOUN
limited to object function (not necessarily position)>OBJECT PRONOUN
實不洗之 “in fact he had not washed himself”>SELF
寡人懼之“I was afraid ofYOU
Ban Zhao: 其勖勉之 “may this encourage and urge you on”>YOU/PLUR
天厭之"May Heaven reject ME!">EGO
用之則行 "When they use US then we engage in public action">WE
